title: Windows XP gamers Edition-DX10
description: This is a slimmed down version of Windows XP. It is really fast because it doesn&#039;t have a lot of the crap that usually bogs down Windows like Internet Explorer. I really don&#039;t have that great of a description for this because this is not an official M*croso*t product. I tested this and it works really fast. It&#039;s not a good idea to install it alongside an official copy of Windows XP. No serial is required for the install and the OS doesn&#039;t need to be activated.
